forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 49. North northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
In the early hours of the day, Downtown San Francisco awakens under a clear, crisp sky, the air fresh with the remnants of night. As dawn approaches, the temperature is pleasantly cool, settling in around the low forties. A gentle north northeast wind whispers through the streets, promising a beautiful Tuesday ahead. The forecast suggests that as the sun rises, it will bathe the city in warm golden light, peaking near sixty-three by midday, before gracefully retreating towards more temperate fifty-degree readings in the afternoon. 

While there is currently no sign of fog to obscure the view, the absence of the marine layer allows for a panorama that invites leisure and exploration. For those venturing into the day, dressing in layers is advisable; a light jacket paired with a long-sleeve shirt will provide comfort against the brisk start while ensuring ease as the sun’s rays begin to warm the surroundings. Today is ideal for a stroll through Golden Gate Park or enjoying a quiet moment at your favorite café, perhaps with a good book, as the city slowly stirs to life, its vibrant energy palpable in the air.
